mapper.select: select available_copies from book where id=#{bookId}
mapper.update: update book set available_copies=available_copies+#{num} where id=#{bookId}
delete from borrow_queue where book_id=#{bookId} and queue_date in ( SELECT a.* from ( select min(queue_date) from borrow_queue where book_id=#{bookId})a )
delete from borrow_queue where book_id=#{bookId} and userId=#{userId}
update borrow_records set return_date=#{return_date},rating=#{rating},comment=#{comment} where user_id=#{user_id} and book_id=#{book_id}
